Body:
net = op.network.Cubic(shape=[10, 10, 10], connectivity=26)
tmask = net['throat.all']
Pin = net.pores('left')
Pout = net.pores('right')
am = net.create_adjacency_matrix(weights=tmask, fmt='coo')
val = topotools.ispercolating(am=am, mode='bond', inlets=Pin, outlets=Pout)
assert val
val = topotools.ispercolating(am=am, mode='site', inlets=Pin, outlets=Pout)
assert val
